response.original_title: Wagakki Band - Daishinnenkai 2021 Nippon Budokan: Amanoiwato
response.overview: Daishinnenkai 2021 Nippon Budokan: Amanoiwato (大新年会2021 日本武道館 ～アマノイワト～, New Year's Party 2021 Nippon Budokan ~Heavenly Rock Cave~) is the eighth live video album by Japanese band Wagakki Band, released on June 9, 2021 by Universal Music Japan in two editions: Blu-ray + DVD and a limited edition release with 60-page photo book. The video covers the band's two-day concert at the Nippon Budokan on January 3–4, 2021.[1][2][3][4]  The video peaked at No. 2 on Oricon's Blu-ray chart.[5]
response.title: Wagakki Band - Daishinnenkai 2021 Nippon Budokan: Amanoiwato
